sort_fields.script_text: int num = 4; if(doc['status.keyword'].value == 'Assigned'){ num = 1} else if(doc['status.keyword'].value == 'Completed') {num = 2} else if(doc['status.keyword'].value == 'Closed') {num = 3} return num;
